class.comment: Represents a listener for an advancement tree.

params.name: root
params.comment: The root of the advancement tree.

onAddAdvancementRoot.comment: Called when a root advancement is added to this tree.

params.name: root
params.comment: The root of the advancement tree.

onRemoveAdvancementRoot.comment: Called when a root advancement is removed from this tree.

onAddAdvancementTask.comment: Called when a non-root advancement is added to this tree.

onRemoveAdvancementTask.comment: Called when a non-root advancement is removed from this tree.

onAdvancementsCleared.comment: Called when all advancements are cleared from this tree.
